Keywords: Horsemen , Mystical , Past , Ruler , Warrior , X-Men
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
KRAKOA IS FOR ALL MUTANTS: When determining themed teams, characters with the Arakko keyword gain the X-Men keyword. // When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword would be hit with a close attack, if they can use Blades/Claws/Fangs they may roll a d6. If they do and the result is greater than the attacker's printed damage value, they evade the attack.
THE EXTERNAL GATE: Flurry, Phasing/Teleport. When Apocalypse uses Phasing/Teleport, after resolutions he may make a close attack.
DESTRUCTIVE PARRY: STOP. Invincible, Super Senses. Each time this click is revealed due to taking damage from an attack, KO an object equipped to the attacker. If the attacker was not equipped, deal them 1 penetrating damage.

Comments
November 28, 2022
fghrt
This guy is just dirty... but in the good way... but also in the way where you feel bad for everyone else... Played in a casual 300 point 4 man FFA. Turn one, PT to the middle of the board. Turn 2, PT behind someone, they drop dead. It didn't take long for the other players to gang up and it was Apocalypse vs 9 other characters. I ended up losing, but it was brutal getting there. The mystics.. the PT... The healing... Hell, just giving him a sword with his KRAKOA IS FOR ALL MUTANTS was enough to keep any brawlers at bay. Just a beast all around, super fun. 10/10 Enjoyment.
November 5, 2022
Maxphyte
Can’t wait to use this figure. Wish I had the Soulsword for him but Warlock is just as good of an option.
August 7, 2022
Redrover454
This is absolutely 300 viable. The STOP click and Steal Energy is what makes it all worth it. Built in equipment defense is HUGE for a tent pole in today's modern, and extra mystics is just as nasty. I've peaked ahead, and one of the swords in this SLOP is BCF, Plasticity, and Shape Change, which seems like the best way to go here. Plasticity keeps people tied up with him for his Flurry, and Shape Change for even more defense. On his STOP, he would be an absolute nightmare to hit. This gives you a better chance to heal back off of/over those STOP clicks, which is what is going to win the game for you. Editing to address the Soul Sword, which gives you the option of double Mystics damage or healing a click when you use Mystics. With back-to-back STOPS, healing off of Mystics means that Apocalypse will truly seem immortal to your opponent!
July 17, 2022
Emtemss
Oh man, what's not to Love here? Easily one of the most fun looking pieces in years.
